member.name: T:TK.MongoDB.GridFS.Repository.Attributes.BucketAttribute
member.summary: Defines GridFS bucket attributes

member.name: P:TK.MongoDB.GridFS.Repository.Attributes.BucketAttribute.PluralizeBucketName
member.summary: Pluralize bucket's mame. Default value is set to True.

member.name: P:TK.MongoDB.GridFS.Repository.Attributes.BucketAttribute.ValidateFileName
member.summary: Validate file name on insert and update from FileNameRegex field. Default value is set to True.

member.name: P:TK.MongoDB.GridFS.Repository.Attributes.BucketAttribute.ValidateFileSize
member.summary: Validate file size on insert from MaximumFileSizeInMBs field. Default value is set to True.

member.name: P:TK.MongoDB.GridFS.Repository.Attributes.BucketAttribute.FileNameRegex
member.summary: File name Regex to validate. Default value is set to Regex(@"^[\w\-. ]+$", RegexOptions.IgnoreCase).

member.name: P:TK.MongoDB.GridFS.Repository.Attributes.BucketAttribute.MaximumFileSizeInMBs
member.summary: Maximum file size in MBs. Default value is set to 5.

member.name: P:TK.MongoDB.GridFS.Repository.Attributes.BucketAttribute.BucketChunkSizeInMBs
member.summary: GridFS bucket chunk size in MBs. Default value is set to 2.

member.name: P:TK.MongoDB.GridFS.Repository.Attributes.BucketAttribute.ConnectionStringName
member.summary: Connection String name from *.config file. Default value is set from Settings.ConnectionStringSettingName.
